description.value:
Type: God

Alignment: Good

Gender: Female

Sphere: Good Luck

Dominion: Gates of the Moon

Priests: Luckbringers

Adjective: Tymoran

Domain: Change, Luck

Tymora, the friendly, graceful, and kind deity of good fortune, is impressively popular among the adventurous set. Her dominance over narrow escapes and lucky discoveries makes her the patron of choice to Faer√ªn's burgeoning adventurer population, who propitiate her in hopes of prolonged survival and spectacular takes.

Published in Forgotten Realms Campaign Guide, page(s) 80.
